data.name: XSearchable
desc: enables the object to look for specified contents of the object (in particular, for a text range which contains a specific string pattern).
Example: in a com.sun.star.text.TextDocument: set all \"search for\" to bold using findFirst()/findNext():

methods.name: createSearchDescriptor
desc: creates a SearchDescriptor which contains properties that specify a search in this container.

methods.name: findAll
desc: searches the contained texts for all occurrences of whatever is specified.

methods.name: findFirst
desc: searches the contained texts for the next occurrence of whatever is specified.

methods.name: findNext
desc: searches the contained texts for the next occurrence of whatever is specified.
